FwkSenCnt.MEANING: a person whose job is to deliver mail; a postman

ExCnt.EX: So today I stuck around the house until the mailman came , he brought me a package but it wasn't the dvds I was waiting for
Ms. Cherry admits that she's not the fastest letter carrier , saying she prefers service to speed.
Caines said that in the first six months of 2004 there were 160 dog attacks on mail carriers across Canada .
